div.div: Lake City Athletic Boosters now offers Trojan logo wear. Available at all home high school games or contact Melissa Rainier 884-4766.
The Lake City Area School community will provide an academically challenging environment that develops the intellectual, social, emotional, physical and creative well-being of all students.

span.p: All students who attend school at Lake City eat breakfast and lunch for free!
